          Constructor: Creates a partition of a set of n elements in m random groups If n mod m <> 0 then the last group is completed with element of the set randomly selected

Constructor Detail

Partition

protected Partition()
Constructor: Default constructor. Useful for inheritance

Partition

public Partition(int n1,
                 int m,
                 boolean random)
Constructor: Creates a partition of a set of n elements in m random groups If n mod m <> 0 then the last group is completed with element of the set randomly selected

Parameters:
n1 - Set size
m - Number of groups
random - If index will be initialized with a permutation or not

Partition

public Partition(int[] index1,
                 int m)
Constructor: Creates a partition of a randomized set in m random groups

Parameters:
index1 - Randomized Set. The data set already permuted
m - Number of groups

Partition

public Partition(int[] index1,
                 int[] groupsSize)
Constructor: Creates a partition of a randomized set and the size of groups

Parameters:
index1 - Randomized Set. The data set already permuted
groupsSize - Size of groups

                 boolean random)
Constructor: Creates a partition of a size of groups

Parameters:
groupsSize - Size of groups
random - If index will be initialized with a permutation or not
